  • Method Details

    • getPlanetReward

      public List<Map<BoxType,Integer>> getPlanetReward()
      Retrieves the list of planet rewards, where each planet reward is represented as a map associating BoxType with its corresponding integer value.
      Overrides:
      getPlanetReward in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      a list of maps, where each map contains BoxType keys and their associated integer values representing the reward for a specific planet.

      Description copied from class: AdventureCard
      Creates the state associated with the adventure card.
      Specified by:
      createState in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:

    • renderPlanetBoxes

      public String renderPlanetBoxes(Integer planetIdx)
      Renders a formatted string representing the box types and their associated values for the specified planet index.
      Parameters:
      planetIdx - the index of the planet whose box types and values are to be rendered
      Returns:
      a string representing contained boxTypes
